website_summaries.verdict: The $500 Bang & Olufsen BeoPlay H8 wireless on-ear headphone looks great, sounds very good and is loaded with features, including noise canceling, but a few small flaws take away some of its luster.
pros: The Bang & Olufsen BeoPlay H8 has a sleek, sturdy design, with a metal/leather headband and plush earcups, and very good sound for Bluetooth

It also features active noise canceling, touch controls in the right earcup and a replaceable rechargeable battery that delivers an ample 14 hours of battery life with Bluetooth and noise canceling turned on
cons: the on-ear design isn't as comfortable as some over-ear designs and the sound isn't quite as open as we would have liked

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth DOES NOT WORK! I used these headphones not even 5 times and the Bluetooth will not even turn on, not to mention it no longer charges. $500 for this? I am without words... I expected so much more. I own the S3 speaker (which also do not work as the speaker cannot handle bass without vibrating off the surface which it sits on) and the A9 which also drops the Bluetooth connection constantly and needs constant resetting. I will be looking at purchasing audio equipment from another company moving forward. There is nothing to be said either for B&O customer service, since you cant even get a phone number for them. SO VERY SAD.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: High pitched noise / Faulty ANC / Faulty aux cable
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! There's a nasty high pitched sound every time I move my hand close to the touch control side of the headphones! There's a static clicking sound when I connect the aux cable into my iphone 6s plus. Is this what I paid $500 for? Don't buy it! I've read here a lot of other users are experiencing the same problem as me! Save your dollars and put it else where! Sadly, there has been no resolution for this issue anywhere online either! I had very high hopes for these headphones! They are simply not up to standards.
customer_reviews.author: A Augustus

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with the headphones. The connection loses within 5 feet from the phone. As for the calls no one was ever able to hear me unless I was in the world's quietest room. So either I got a bad one or they are all not that great. I do have to say though when it comes to the style and look of them they are super sexy. You can tell they are expansive. The sound is also amazing when it comes to music. And as long as its not cutting off the sound is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: gina kesh

customer_reviews.title: ... expectation the noise cancelling during air travel is really good. I don't care if the noise cancelling removes ...
customer_reviews.text: Fully living up to every expectation the noise cancelling during air travel is really good. I don't care if the noise cancelling removes some of the fidelity from the sound - on board an air plane I care more about removing background noise and crying babies. The entertainment systems don't really provide high fidelity sound anyway. No problems with blue-tooth works perfectly on my Linux laptop by the way. I'm 110% happy with this things - and then it looks stylish. Btw. the sound of these things when playing high fidelity sound is incredible .... the bass is rich and trebles are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the prettiest headphones ever made.
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest. I bought these because I needed wireless with noise-cancellation and I wanted gorgeous. These are stunning and show-stopping. Unfortunately, although I have an abnormally large head for a woman, these were still too big. I also couldn't wear them for longer than an hour without feeling a pinch, oddly enough. So, not great for flights and not great for gym. I sold them. Very pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: eeeeevaaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: The only downside is the bluetooth range. Walk few ...
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is the bluetooth range. Walk few feet i.e less than 5 feet away from the connection and the sound quality fades quickly.
customer_reviews.author: webbits

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looks, awesome sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you purchase high end products simply because you just want to stand out from the crowd. When the stand out looks are matched by equally perfect performance the expression is simply WOW. The carton of this product is velvety to feel. Packaging is simple and really nice. The sound is what you expect from B&O. I love the headphones . Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Ominyi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Gorgeous product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Gorgeous product! The leather on the ears didn't fit well to me. I hated that I love Bose more because I so wanted to keep this beautiful headset.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cadillac Delux of headphones. It is supremely stylish and sounds warm with a little to the bass side of neutral. My wife gets compliments every time she has them on.
customer_reviews.author: Rasco Rascal

customer_reviews.title: Great for my active lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Snug fit, but not too tight. I used them when in the pool doing my exercises, gym workouts & traveling from here to there on my bicycle. Excellent balance & clarity of music, podcasts, books, etc. I am not an expert to the details of sound quality, they're great for me.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. The navigation on the side, however, does not work well with Pandora or Spotify. The sounds is incredible, they are beyond comfy, and I feel so stylish every time I put them on. I recommend you get the hard case as they do not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far, the unit meets my expectations. Happy with my purchase. *Note to Buyers: Hightly recommend purchasing the extended (canopy?) warranty at the time of placing order.
customer_reviews.author: Love Extreme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. 1 problem. I have to hide them from my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Ed Adler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones and sound quality. Noise canceling better than my Bose (used on flight). Has a cable so that if battery runs out, still can be used as headphones using the headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bina

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing; lightweight; connected extremely convinence
customer_reviews.text: Feels amazing than any other similar headphones! The only sad thing is price goes down only one day after I purchase from $499 to $459. I wish Amazon can price match with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Z.Liu

customer_reviews.title: We love it but the on ear format can get a ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it but the on ear format can get a bit painful if you intend to use it for more than an hour of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Vman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, make sure to update it's software
customer_reviews.text: Bough these in the Gold Color and love them. Excellent battery life and sound quality, whether through bluetooth or through the wire. The build quality is fantastic also. One thing I highly suggest. Make sure to UPDATE the software on the headphones once you purchase them. This will certainly fix many of the bluetooth connectivity issues that I've seen people posting about. Here is the Link with instructions on how to update (on a Mac): [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check with your doctor before using.
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after I bought these for an overseas trip I had an ear check-up and the ear specialist said the loud noise cancelling feature can cause damage to your ear...so now they are collecting dust in the basement. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, portable with incredible sound. Extremely well made. No problems at all with the BT.
customer_reviews.author: Sticky

customer_reviews.title: i love they fact they are light and VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just got this.. headphones, i love they fact they are light and VERY comfortable. yet. when i walk i can hear my steps in like vibration. also sometimes the music mutes for a fraction of a second .. OFTEN.. i thought it could be the wireless, or maybe stream music, so i disable the wiress and play just music on my phone. and yet still happen. .. any suggestion???
customer_reviews.author: Sharky305

customer_reviews.title: Great looking... Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: I really would like to love this pair of headphones, but the connection issues are really frustrating. It will sometimes drop connection untirely or will crackel in and out. I would personally go for Sennheiser or Bose over this pair. Your paying for the name, not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: A little small. Wireless feature stopped working after two ...
customer_reviews.text: A little small. Wireless feature stopped working after two or three uses. Noise cancellation and sound quality far inferior to the Bose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jon from Reston VA

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are all about quality. We are enjoying them immensely. My only complaint is my husband and I have to take turns using them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S

customer_reviews.title: Think twice if you have big head and glasses... But I still love it
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable with a big head and with glasses.
customer_reviews.author: karenliu1987

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones, perfect fit and amazing sound and quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones, perfect fit and amazing sound and quality the ANC works great and is very clear. My only complaint is the bluetooth seems to be very short distance, this is my second pair and the first pair I could not get more than 3ft from and they would start poping loosing connection, I have an iphone 6 plus and also tried them with my wifes iphone 6 and same results so I returned, the new pair is better I can get around 10ft away before any breakups in connection begins to happen. I hope B&O can release a firmware update to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: XXX

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great B&O sound. Controls need work. Website over described the bass and the controls. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Rider

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This worked for a few hours and then permanently disconnected itself from Bluetooth. Tried returning but to no avail - do not recommend this product or supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Martyjimbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality doesn't last. Plus piece keep breaking off. Not to mention I hardly use them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: beyond me expecation
customer_reviews.text: it's marvellous. It's still unknown to me. but when i first time play I need a doctor in H8, I was shocked
customer_reviews.author: Swell Young

customer_reviews.title: #Regrets #SoundOfSilence
customer_reviews.text: You'll love the first few months. Then it's all downhill. Rather save your $499. You'll get more pleasure from burning $100 and saving the remaining $399. First my blue tooth started dropping (2 weeks) Then my blue tooth stopped working (2 months) Then my aux cable started bugging out (6 months) Then I started using my apple earphones again (6 months and 1 day) Wish I had just stuck with the apple earphones. On the bright side my earphones look very cool, they don't work but they look super cool!
customer_reviews.author: Reka

customer_reviews.title: very good. I imagine wired with a good headphone amp ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very, very good. I imagine wired with a good headphone amp and source, and not an iPhone that they'd sound even better. Build quality is excellent. They're a little tight when you first get them, but will break in. Leather is attractive and incredibly soft. Connectivity works well for the most part. I connect 90% of the time without an issue. Not sure if the handshake issue is on my phone/computer or the headphone itself. Noise cancellation is very good. The only thing I would ask for is an auto-off function, but not a whole lot of competitive headphones have that feature right now.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Prohibitively uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are painful to wear for more than about 45 minutes. If you wear them to work, as I do, this is a bad option. (They are beautiful, though. I wear them when I am swanning through airports.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very poor Bluetooth connection the music is skipping all the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor Bluetooth connection the music is skipping all the time so you need a wired connection there are better solution out there
customer_reviews.author: John jensen

customer_reviews.title: Could've been worth it
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are super comfortable It's amazing the control's on the ear them selves connection to me is fine only thing tht bugs me are 2 things one when you walk you hear something clinging as you are listening to your music two you can NOT lay down w these you will get feedback/high pitched noise like when a microphone is near a speaker
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Tuiza

customer_reviews.title: If you need a premium headphones then stop looking. You found it!
customer_reviews.text: This the best headphones in the market by far. I have used B&O before and this new product just brings the voice and build quality beyond expectations. Light weight, comfortable, music sounds new and songs are worth listening to again and again. The noise cancelation is superb and bluetooth quality is as good as the rest. Planning for a 13hrs flight next week and will be testing this new headphones and pushing every single bit of its battery to the limits. I can certainly recommend this product and although $500 is a lot but its worth the money and you will find that out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ShakooMakoo

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned the Parrot Zik's I had purchased and anxiously awaited the H8, I was not disappointed! The ease of use, superb sound and great fit make this an exceptional purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Dufault

customer_reviews.title: Poor noise cancelation.
customer_reviews.text: Subpar noise canceling. Bose QC 15 or 25 is far superior. For 500, I would expect better noise cancellation. Took 3 hour trip and I can hear all noises around and they made me extremely uncomfortable. Returning them back
customer_reviews.author: JayBiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is real value for money. Just an awesome piece. love it
customer_reviews.author: KWAME DARKO

product_meta.title: B&O Play by Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H8 Wireless On-Ear Headphone with Active Noise Cancelling, Bluetooth 4.2 (Argilla Bright)
product_meta.description: BeoPlay H8 is a premium, lightweight, wireless, active noise cancelling on-ear headphone with optimally balanced sound. Featuring intuitive touch interface for control, and a replaceable battery that gives up to 14 hours of listening, using active noise cancellation and Bluetooth. Beoplay H8 is the perfect match of style and function.
feature_bullets: Premium, light-weight, wireless, active noise cancelling on-ear headphones. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound no matter if active noise cancellation is turned on or off
B&O PLAY products come with a 2-year limited warranty only when purchased from an authorized dealer including Amazon.com (indicated by ships from and sold by Amazon.com).
Aluminum touch interface on the right ear cup gives you complete control of your music and phone calls
Up to 14 hours of battery life with active noise cancellation and Bluetooth turned on. Circle clockwise or counter-clockwise for volume adjustment.
At just 255g, BeoPlay H8 is one of the lightest wireless active noise cancelling headphones on the market

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars124 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
